text: Covington is a small city in the U.S. state of Louisiana. It is the parish seat of St. Tammany Parish. ==Movies filmed in Covington== Year Film 1995 Dead Man Walking 1995 Kingfish: A Story of Huey Long 1997 Kasi Lemmons' Eve's Bayou 2005 Local Color 2008 The Yellow Handkerchief 2009 I Love You Phillip Morris 2010 The Pregnancy Pact 2012 The Lucky One 2013 Beautiful Creatures ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Covington official website * Covington Business Association Category:Cities in St. Tammany Parish, Louisiana Category:Parish seats in Louisiana
title: Covington, Louisiana
